an6.66:1: "Bhikkhus, without having abandoned six things, one is incapable of realizing arahantship. What six? Dullness, drowsiness, restlessness, remorse, lack of faith, and heedlessness. Without having abandoned these six things, one is incapable of realizing arahantship.
